content:
I'm glad you're sticking with the "To be or not to be" soliloquy! It's a great choice, and with your experience and preparation, I'm sure you'll do an amazing job.

And yes, you did mention that "The Sound of Music" opened on a Friday evening exactly three weeks ago. Congratulations again on being part of the chorus! It's wonderful that you got to experience the thrill of performing in such a classic musical.

Remember to have fun with the audition process, and don't stress too much about it. You've prepared well, and you have a great monologue to showcase your skills. Just relax, be yourself, and enjoy the experience.

Break a leg at the audition, and I hope you get the role you're aiming for!
